action: Set Brightness for a Leviton Dimmer
action_description: This action will brighten or dim a Decora Smart Wi-Fi Dimmer to a specific value.
This action will run a My Leviton Scene.
This action will brighten a Decora Smart Wi-Fi Dimmer.
This action will turn on all devices in a My Leviton Room.
This action will run a My Leviton Activity.
This action will set a Leviton Residence to Home or Away.
This action will toggle a Decora Smart Wi-Fi device On/Off.
This action will set a Leviton Fan Speed Controller's speed.
This action will turn off all devices in a My Leviton Room.
This action will make a light blink.
This action will dim a Decora Smart Wi-Fi Dimmer.
